name: Push That Cat!!
description:
Recently, the boss's cats have been acting inappropriately by resting in unapproved locations. Before he learns, you must return them to their proper locations as the one and only cat manager of the space facility.Put those kitties back in their places

Feature
  • 25 challenging level for you to solve
  • Final boss cat puzzle fight
  • Steam achievements
  • Simple and intuitive game play
  • Relaxing 8 bit music
